676385896f9d85d81d974d66 description: It's hard to find people in Tarkov that you can trust these days. Maybe you can begin to prove yourself to me and help me out?
676385896f9d85d81d974d66 startedMessageT: Are you a trust worthy person? Can you prove yourself to me?
676385896f9d85d81d974d66 successMessaget: I see that you have proven yourself to me. For that, I'll give you this and allow you to buy a few of my items.
6767a1d14b6b88c9e9b07d84 description: Now that you've shown me you can follow direction, I need you to check out a location that was once used as a hospital or a sort of place that was used to provide medical services.
6767a1d14b6b88c9e9b07d84 startedMessageT: All you need to do is just simply go scout that location.
6767a1d14b6b88c9e9b07d84 successMessaget: I have a feeling we will need to go back to that spot.
6767a2b4d865374272d49c0f: Find the room that was used to provide medical services in the building known as 'Crackhouse'.
67817dd744d985f05ed8a0e5 description: It appears that others took notice of the scouting that you did on Customs. I need you to make a point, we aren't fucking around.
67817dd744d985f05ed8a0e5 startedMessageT: Kill a few PMC's, that should send a message
67817dd744d985f05ed8a0e5 successMessaget: Now let's see if they take us seriously.
678357b492116f3d9daa65fb description: Things are a little quiet right now and I'm not sure I like that. Go shake things up
678357b492116f3d9daa65fb startedMessageT: Scavs are a pain in the ass, do something about it
678357b492116f3d9daa65fb successMessaget: That should do the trick...for now.
678358e94d8921e190e016c2: Kill 20 Scavs throughout the Tarkov region
